1274390.name: Bud Masters - Battle Edition
1274390.description:
Bud Masters is a solo-developed, casual indie weed lifestyle card game.

The goal is simple, draw and play your cards to deplete your opponent's bud bowl while defending your own bud bowl.

Turn Time:
120 seconds

Match time:
10-30 minutes depending on average size of player decks and skill.

Custom Deck Size:
50 cards

Choose to play against a stoned (yet surprisingly adept AI), or engage in PvP against a (probably) stoned human...

160+ cards / avatars
75+ card abilities

BATTLE EDITION

- 6 AI Personalities
- 50+ AI deck variations / difficulty levels- contains custom deck builder
- unlock cards with winnings

Also Available - FREE PEACE EDITION

The free 'Peace Edition' contains the 'One of Each' game mode using the whole deck and vs The Experiment AI. Perfect for learning the rules, combos and cards and seeing if the gameplay is right for you!

ALL EDITIONS

I am committed to making fun, unique experience games without undue monetization.

- No micro-transactions
- No purchasable currency
- No paid digital deck expansions
- No pay to win

JUST PLAY

- No additional game accounts or sign ups required.

The core game on Steam is all you need to find / connect / play with others.

GLHF AND ALL FEEDBACK APPRECIATED!
- Jono
1274390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
